divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving the house around 9:20 my boyfriends dad was picking me up to go to the store. i walked out and saw two orange lights beside each other i stopped and look cause at first i thought oh cool two planets must have lined up then as i thought that i saw the one on the lower left fade like a flame in a jar is the best i can explain it then a second later the higher one did the same. it hapened slowly but fast enough for me to sit there in all it scared me i felt like it saw me looking and hid or something like that. it made me feel uncomfortable. i posted about it on fb. no one else saw it. his dad saw me standing in the middle of the yard and ask what you looking at told him and he said might have been a plane but i pointed to an orange street light and said it looked about like that and he said he never seen a plane like that they just hovered and disappeared with in a minute.
Summary: 2 orange lights that faded one after the other
